title: Royal Enfield reports 43% rise in total sales in June
description: Domestic sales last month were at 50,265 units as against 35,815 units in June 2021, a growth of 40 per cent. Exports were up 54 per cent at 11,142 units. The same stood at 7,233 units in the same month last year, it said.
